verses.text: Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w* of \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w came|strong="G3854"\w* wise \w men|strong="G3097"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w east|strong="G0395"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that is \w born|strong="G5088"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w star|strong="G0792"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w east|strong="G0395"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add these things\add*, he was \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G2532"\w* he had \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w together|strong="G4863"\w*, he \w demanded|strong="G4441"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* should be \w born|strong="G1080"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w* of \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w*, \add in\add* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Juda|strong="G2448"\w*, \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w not|strong="G3760"\w* the \w least|strong="G1646"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w princes|strong="G2232"\w* of \w Juda|strong="G2448"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* shall \w come|strong="G1831"\w* a \w Governor|strong="G2233"\w*, \w that|strong="G3748"\w* shall \w rule|strong="G4165"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, when he \w had|strong="G2564"\w* \w privily|strong="G2977"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the wise \w men|strong="G3097"\w*, \w enquired|strong="G0198"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w diligently|strong="G0198"\w* what \w time|strong="G5550"\w* the \w star|strong="G0792"\w* \w appeared|strong="G5316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Go|strong="G4198"\w* and \w search|strong="G1833"\w* \w diligently|strong="G0199"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1875"\w* ye have \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add him\add*, \w bring|strong="G0518"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* word \w again|strong="G0518"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* may \w come|strong="G2064"\w* and \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* they had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w*, they \w departed|strong="G4198"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w star|strong="G0792"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w east|strong="G0395"\w*, went \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w till|strong="G2193"\w* it \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w over|strong="G1883"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w star|strong="G0792"\w*, they \w rejoiced|strong="G5463"\w* with \w exceeding|strong="G4970"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G2147"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: and \w when|strong="G2532"\w* they had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w treasures|strong="G2344"\w*, they \w presented|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w*; \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w frankincense|strong="G3030"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w myrrh|strong="G4666"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* being warned of \w God|strong="G5537"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* a \w dream|strong="G3677"\w* that they \w should|strong="G0344"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w return|strong="G0344"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, they \w departed|strong="G0402"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w country|strong="G5561"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w departed|strong="G0402"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w appeareth|strong="G5316"\w* to \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* a \w dream|strong="G3677"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Arise|strong="G1453"\w*, and \w take|strong="G3880"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w thou|strong="G2468"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* I \w bring|strong="G2036"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w word|strong="G2036"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* to \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* he \w arose|strong="G1453"\w*, he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* by \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G0402"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* the \w death|strong="G5054"\w* of \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w* have I \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the wise \w men|strong="G3097"\w*, \w was|strong="G2373"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G3029"\w* \w wroth|strong="G2373"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sent \w forth|strong="G0649"\w*, and \w slew|strong="G0337"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w children|strong="G3816"\w* that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* two years \w old|strong="G1332"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w under|strong="G2736"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he had diligently \w enquired|strong="G0198"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the wise \w men|strong="G3097"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* was \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* that which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w Jeremy|strong="G2408"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w Rama|strong="G4471"\w* was \w there|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w lamentation|strong="G2355"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2805"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w mourning|strong="G3602"\w*, \w Rachel|strong="G4478"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w* \add for\add* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

¶ But \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* was \w dead|strong="G5053"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w appeareth|strong="G5316"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* a \w dream|strong="G3677"\w* to \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Arise|strong="G1453"\w*, and \w take|strong="G3880"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they are \w dead|strong="G2348"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* the young \w child’s|strong="G3813"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w arose|strong="G1453"\w*, and \w took|strong="G3880"\w* the young \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when he \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Archelaus|strong="G0745"\w* did \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w* in the room \w of|strong="G0473"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, he was \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* to \w go|strong="G0565"\w* \w thither|strong="G1563"\w*: \w notwithstanding|strong="G1161"\w*, being warned of \w God|strong="G5537"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* a \w dream|strong="G3677"\w*, he turned \w aside|strong="G0402"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w parts|strong="G3313"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*: \w that|strong="G3704"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, He shall be \w called|strong="G2564"\w* a \w Nazarene|strong="G3480"\w*.
